added.candle_cakes: • Blocks in this tag are considered candle cakes and can be lit, if they have the lit block state set to false.
added.candles: • Blocks in this tag are considered candles and can be lit, if they have the lit, and waterlogged block state and both are false.
added.cauldrons: • This tag is used in certain pathfinding processes.[more information needed]
added.crystal_sound_blocks:
• Blocks in this tag play play the "amethyst block chime" sound repeatedly for a short amount of time after being stepped on, gradually decreasing in volume.
  • The initial step sound is not affected by this tag.
added.deepslate_ore_replaceables:
• Iron ore, redstone ore, gold ore, diamond ore, and lapis lazuli ore can generate in blocks in this tag, and if they do, they become their deepslate variant
  • Infested stone (from blobs) that generates in a block in this tag generates as infested deepslate
added.dirt:
• Grass, tall grass, ferns, tall ferns, sweet berry bushes, saplings, flowers, azaleas, sugar cane, and dead bushes can be placed on blocks in this tag.
  • Pumpkins and melons can grow into blocks in this tag.
  • Used in the #bamboo_plantable_on and #enderman_holdable block tags.
added.dripstone_replaceable_blocks: • Used in dripstone generation to determine what dripstone can replace and what pointed dripstone can generate on.
added.features_cannot_replace: • Blocks with this tag cannot be replaced by any generated features
added.geode_invalid_blocks: • Amethyst geodes cannot try to generate inside blocks in this tag.
added.inside_step_sound_blocks: • While the player walks in a block in this tag, the step sound noises of the sound type of the block are played instead of the noise of the below block.
added.lava_pool_stone_replaceables: • Blocks in this tag cannot be replaced by stone generated in lava pools.
added.lush_ground_replaceable: • Rooted dirt from azalea trees and clay patches and pools in lush caves can replace blocks in this tag.
added.mineable/axe: • Blocks in this tag are mined faster with axes.
added.mineable/hoe: • Blocks in this tag are mined faster with hoes.
added.mineable/pickaxe: • Blocks in this tag are mined faster with pickaxes.
added.mineable/shovel: • Blocks in this tag are mined faster with shovels.
added.moss_replaceable: • Blocks in this tag can be replaced with moss blocks when a nearby moss block has bone meal applied to it.
added.needs_diamond_tool: • If a block in this tag requires a certain type tool to drop, it will require a diamond, or better, tool to drop.
added.needs_iron_tool: • If a block in this tag requires a certain type tool to drop, it will require an iron, or better, tool to drop.
added.needs_stone_tool: • If a block in this tag requires a certain type tool to drop, it will require a stone, or better, tool to drop.
added.occludes_vibration_signals: • Blocks in this tag prevent sculk sensors from hearing vibrations if the block is between the sculk sensor and the vibration.
added.small_dripleaf_placeable: • Small dripleaves can be placed on blocks in this tag, even if there is no water in the block where the small dripleaf is being placed.
added.snow: • Blocks in this tag turn blocks with a snowy variant below them (like grass) into said snow variant.
added.stone_ore_replaceables:
• Iron ore, redstone ore, gold ore, diamond ore, and lapis lazuli ore can generate as their stone variants in blocks in this tag
  • Infested stone (from blobs) that generates in a block in this tag generate as infested stone
